CatDescriptText: Alan Drotos, drafting student, Shaler Township, was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column, published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 10, 1962, pg. 11 with question: "Do you think a shorter work week is the answer to the job loss posed by automation?" Answer reads: "In a way, I think it would be better because it would create more jobs."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Alan Drotos wearing light colored overcoat, posed in front of building
